website_summaries.verdict: A well-constructed picnic backpack with unique front-facing blanket storage. Choose it if you need a sturdy option that's easier to maneuver through crowds.
pros: Excellent insulation, capable of keeping food hot or cold for up to 12 hours
Roomy interior offers plenty of space for munchies for up to 4 picnickers
Blanket is easy to fold with a Velcro strap to keep it in place with front storage that's great for concerts or other crowded venues
Complete set with all necessary accessories
cons: No separate bottle holder means drinks need to be stored in the bag itself

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this backpack twice now for summer events in the park, and it works great. Plates, cutlery, and wine mugs are decent quality, they should last awhile. Plenty of room for a bottle of wine in the pouch (or two!) and snacks. Threw an ice pack in the back and it kept everything cool for hours, even in high temps. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: I am in love...
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this picnic backpack! It’s got a little weight to it, but I look forward to using it for picnicking after hikes with my kids!! It literally has EVERYTHING I need (minus the food & drink) for the perfect picnic every single time. The blanket isn’t huge (imo), but it’s large enough to make it work. I’m very happy with my purchase! Well worth the money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: SpunkeyMama

customer_reviews.title: Very nice little picnic pack
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little picnic pack. Wine glasses are of a harder plastic that appears will hold up well. If you don't need the blanket, the pouch is available to carry extra items. The cold pack area adequate handles lunch meat, cheeses and spreads. We always have a smaller cooler with us for beer, soft drinks and wine. Usually have another bag for chips and crackers.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Jo

customer_reviews.title: Consider this instead of a picnic basket
customer_reviews.text: This just arrived, so I can't comment on durability -- But the backpack is well designed and the contents seem to be of good quality. One reason we chose this over a cutsey picnic basket is the insulated section for food. It's tall and narrow, like any backpack section, but it would easily hold a wine bottle or two and several food items. We bought this as a gift and I think the recipient is going to be very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam North

customer_reviews.title: ... for an opportunity to do something a little different like have a picnic in a pretty location
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter and her husband for an opportunity to do something a little different like have a picnic in a pretty location. So, daughter made a little picnic lunch and met her husband on location while servicing his Snap On route. She said it was lovely and fun, so if you want to go beyond the usual habits of grabbing fast food or spending too much at a restaurant indoors, this is a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: S. Warner

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack!  Fits a lot!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Hike alot and this holds alot but it is not heavy itself. Comes with a coupon that I could not get to work..........
customer_reviews.author: Donna K O'Donohoe

customer_reviews.title: We love this backpack
customer_reviews.text: We love this backpack. Took it to Disney World with us (2 kids, 2 adults and lots of cousins) and always had what we needed with plenty of room for extras. Canned water, fruit, snack bars, juice boxes, etc. It's surprisingly spacious and comfortable all day long.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: A big hit as a gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought several of these as holiday gifts for my staff... was definitely a hit! They invariably started telling me how they plan to put them to use! I put a lot of effort (mentally, at least) into tying to pick a gift each year that will be useful, and gift-worthy... this backpack did not disappoint! I only wish there had been a different color to choose from (there is a navy one on the marketing material, but gray was my only option).
customer_reviews.author: JSM

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: This is intended as a Christmas gift. Of all of the ones offered I must say I could not be more pleased and impressed with the quality. Great value, excellent fabrics, excellent size and very lightweight. It is better than I imagined.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon P

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs one 😊
customer_reviews.text: This picnic pack is very ideal for more then just a picnic, say you have a couple friends over cute set to use, all item are good quality made, it's just adorable, perfect wedding gift and comes with a outdoor blanket which is very nice size.
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: She liked all the different pockets for storing different items
customer_reviews.text: We bought this backpack as a gift to my mother in law who loves boating. When she opened it on Christmas Day she was so excited and very much looking forward to using it! She liked all the different pockets for storing different items, and the best feature is over course that it's waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable Backpack Picnic Basket!
customer_reviews.text: As a rule I always buy a picnic basket as a wedding gift and have for years. This time, the couple already has a little girl so they already have 'stuff' to carry so for them to be able to be hands free I went w/this backpack picnic basket. Oh my gosh!!! This is the best thing ever!!! Before I wrapped it I had to put it on (very comfortable and lightweight). I also had to check out all the serving pieces inside (plates, glasswear, CORKSCREW, etc. Perfect! They will be SO excited! Good job Scuddles! Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a gift but I love it. It is packed well and lightweight and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift but I love it. It is packed well and lightweight and has everything you need for the perfect picnic. I personally have a cooler/picnic bag which is heavy and bulky and I'm thinking about getting rid of that and getting the backpack for myself instead. I would recommend this product, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: TDN

customer_reviews.title: The backpack is awesome. Lots of space for cold stuff like cheeses ...
customer_reviews.text: The backpack is awesome. Lots of space for cold stuff like cheeses and meats, etc., the blanket is very strong and plenty of space for 4 people, knives are very sharp and cut very well. Don’t leave Home without the backpack for any picnics. Highly recommended for anyone who likes to picnic.
customer_reviews.author: Nay M.

customer_reviews.title: Bride and groom loved it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a wedding present. The bride and groom loved it. Hopefully it will work out great for them. The space to put your food could have been a little bigger but other that that I liked if.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Hanne

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set
customer_reviews.text: Had to send the 1st on back but it was quick and seemless. Second one came in perfect condition and i cant wait to use it
customer_reviews.author: Lyn Lampton

customer_reviews.title: Great but not used much yet
customer_reviews.text: Have not used the product yet but after going through it, it has everything we would ever need! Pretty excited to use it. One thing I’m interested in seeing is if the ice melts through the bag from the cooler. If that would happen, then it would make it uncomfortable. But so far very impressed with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Hughes Family

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The product is as advertised! After doing a bit I've research on 4-person picnic backpacks, this one seemed to have the best $-for-$ value. This is the only picnic backpack I've owned so I haven't done a physical comparison to others on the market, but the quality's great based on my experience thus far. Looking forward to using it much more over time.
customer_reviews.author: Jugo

customer_reviews.title: I want one!
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased this backpack as a wedding gift for my friends and it looks amazing! Great quality, great look (doesn't make you look like a goober like most picnic packs I've seen) and comfortable fit! After seeing it in person, we want to get one for ourselves! Even if not going on a picnic, because of the large insulated main compartment, this pack would be great for bringing beers and snacks on the river or for any outdoor adventure.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Missing plates
customer_reviews.text: I really love this portable picnic back pack, however the settings were for 4, but there were only 2 plates. Very disappointing. I didn't want to return the entire item, just would have liked the option of receiving the two missing plates.
customer_reviews.author: Truthfullysweet

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this backpack as a gift for someone so I haven't used it personally, but I looked through it and I was really impressed. The contents are basic plastic but the backpack material was high quality. I have no complaints, especially for low the price (compared to other picnic backpacks on Amazon).
customer_reviews.author: Darla A.

customer_reviews.title: I love this unit
customer_reviews.text: I love this unit! It takes the idea of covering lunch to a new level. This set allows you to basically carry the basic items with you with little effort. Suddenly, the park has became the new lunch setting again. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Starks

customer_reviews.title: Quality and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful picnic backpack! I can’t wait to give it to my sister in and law and her hubby, and I got a second for my sister and her bf. Wanting one for myself now! :)
customer_reviews.author: bleighmarcotte

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This product exceeded my expectations! The material is high-quality and appears to be very durable. The middle section (like where a kid would put his books) is insulated for cold drinks & cheese. The glasses are small, but nice. All of the cutlery and plates are nice - not fine china, but who takes that on a picnic. This will be great on trips to watch bands at the local winery. I'm very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Blair

customer_reviews.title: They love it. Use it almost every weekend
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my son & daughter-in-law. They love it. Use it almost every weekend. Looks like it will hold up for a good long time. More then room enough for everything.
customer_reviews.author: kimo

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for gift giving !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my boss for his cruise and he and his wife loved it !
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: this bag has it all!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a wedding present. I really can't comment on how good it really is, but I liked it enough to buy it based on what I read!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Clark

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, ready for hiking beauty
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my parents who live in Hungary and hike all the time. I opened it and tested all the components before I wrapped it up. Dishes are sturdy and I don't think I could crack the cups if I tried. The blanket is awesome. The only thing I am concerned about is the sturdiness of the zippers. They seem fine now but they also seem thin, but as for now they are holding up! I'm sure they will be fine as long as you don't over pack the cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice looking picnic backpack that I purchased for a gift. The picnic gear and thermos is a bonus; pack is roomy and attractive. Can't wait to give it!
customer_reviews.author: dkurcz

customer_reviews.title: Everything for a perfect picnic!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and they absolutely loved it! Everything needed for a picnic in the park or to take to a festival!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived as advertised. It’s a solid product and would recommend it to anyone looking for this picnic set. My wife previously had a wicker picnic basket and it fell apart through the years. The backpack picnic set will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Paul G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. We gave it as a gift and the recipients loved it. It is exactly as described. Very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: DAK

customer_reviews.title: Great for car travel
customer_reviews.text: Great price and size. As well as planning picnics, we leave ours in our car to use whenever we travel to make it easy to avoid fast food and long restaurant lines. There's room in the insulated section to add extra paper plates, plastic ware, cups for kids and a stack of napkins.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, lots of storage space
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a gift for our sister in law. She absolutely loves it. Great quality, lots of storage space, but small enough to take on a bike ride to the park for a picnic. Her daughter also loves the plastic wine glasses, and insists on keeping one in the house to use when mommy has her own wine!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a fam of 4!

customer_reviews.title: Unique Gift Idea
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift for my sister and brother in-law. Looks like it is good quality and durable and they seemed very pleased with it. Everyone in the room thought it was very unique and loved the idea.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, modern, and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most precious picnic backpack. I purchased it as a gift for a colleague, and now I think I will purchase it for other gifts as well. High quality and beautifully made.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kayaking, biking, hiking etc.
customer_reviews.text: This is going to be perfect for all of my outdoor adventures. My boyfriend and I are always out and about and the other picnic bags we've looked at are a little too bulky. It's nice that the blanket is located in front instead of on the side. I am going to spray the outside with a waterproofing spray just to keep it clean but I highly recomend this product!!

customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect gift for everyone. I purchased one for a wedding gift and one for our family gift exchange for Christmas. My friends love it and use it weekly!

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The bag is well-constructed and the insulated compartment is spacious and keeps things nice and cool. The plastic dishes and silverware are of pretty good quality, and are lightweight, which is nice when you have a fully loaded pack. I'm a fan.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described!

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice picnic backpack for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice picnic backpack for the price. I only took off one star because I wish the insulated food compartment was a little larger. It worked today when 3 of us took a picnic lunch with a fat container with a salad, 3 apples, bag of almonds, 2 water bottles and a small package of cookies. It is a very attractive bag and I thought the napkins were of a good quality. I really like the overall look of this bag and plan on using it often as my family love to eat outdoors.

product_meta.title: Scuddles Picnic Backpack-Picnic Basket for 4 Person with Insulated Cooler Compartment-Detachable Bottle/Wine Holder-Waterproof Blanket and Full Cutlery Set (4 Person)
feature_bullets: ALL IN ONE PICNIC SET: scuddles picnic backpack is all inclusive for the best picnic experience. Featuring an elegant cheese board, 1 cheese knife set and Anti-shatter acrylic cups, corkscrew, bottle opener and a thermos for the ultimate wine and cheese experience. Washable high-quality napkins and a 4 person anti rust-stainless steel cutlery and plate set. Set is completed with a cozy soft blanket with a water-proof backing.

KEEP YOUR FOOD FRESH: A large inner food compartment with a premium insulated lining maintains the correct temperature for your delicious foods, fresh fruits, tasty desserts & favorite beverages. Extra large (11” x 7” x 14”) compartment can easily pack food and drinks for up to 4 people. Heavy insulation keep food hot/cold for up to 12 hours or more.

SURPRISE YOUR LOVED ONES: scuddles picnic backpack makes a great gift Idea! Perfect for couples, wine gift baskets, unique wedding gifts, housewarming, anniversary, birthday and Christmas gift idea. Practical enough for family outdoor camping BBQ & beach party.includes a super soft Picnic Blanket ( size 58 X 50) for relaxing in the park or camping. Our picnic backpack is light weight & features soft padded shoulder straps which is extremely easy on shoulders.

THERMOS INCLUDED : scuddles picnic backpack includes a thermos and a detachable insulated wine/bottle cooler compartment to carry a large bottle of wine/water securely along with a large 58x50 inch waterproof back fleece picnic blanket.

𝐖𝐄 𝐀𝐑𝐄 𝐀 𝐔𝐒𝐀 𝐁𝐑𝐀𝐍𝐃 – We are a recognized national brand that stands behind our customers. We are therefore offering a lifetime warranty if you don’t like the picnic backpack so you have absolutely nothing to lose. Feel free to return for a FULL REFUND of your picnic backpack.
